text: Sasha Calle (; born August 7, 1995) is an American actress. She is known for her work in the soap opera The Young and the Restless as chef Lola Rosales. She played the superheroine Supergirl in the DC Extended Universe movie The Flash (2023). Calle was born in Boston, Massachusetts. She is of Colombian descent. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Living people Category:1995 births Category:Actors from Boston Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors
title: Sasha Calle
